text: Læa klum chn khxng khea di totheiyng khea khea di klaw wa phwk than ca totheiyng chan nı reux ngxallxh kranan hrux? Læa thæcring phraxngkh di thrng næana chan læw læa chan ca mi klaw sing thi phwk than hı sing nan pen phakhi khun nxkcak phracea khxng kha phraxngkh ca thrng prasngkh sing hnung sing dı theanan phracea khxng channan mi khwam ru kwangkhwang thaw thuk sing læw phwk cea mi raluk luk hrux
